title: Oceania make history at Rift Rivals

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
jAOCBTAN IS FAT
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Well done Oceana. We are best region now, bring it on korea we will smash you!
u r sooooo cute, bby

Way to bite off more than you can chew.... let's be realistic and focus on Turkey and Brazil at worlds first. Chiefs have to be the team to get there, and when they do I look forward to seeing them progress past the group stage. When Oceania has secured that round 2 start at worlds by constantly dominating in Rift, the other minors (and maybe NA) at MSI AND their stage 2 rivals, THEN you can THINK about starting to talk like that, but I still wouldn't.
Way to take a joke buddy
Lets go OCE! Watching Legacy get that win on the back of Claire was one of the best moments in my career as a former player for Legacy, now shoutcaster!

It was awesome to see Legacy turn up, clinically powering through their first game, which I honestly did not expect them to win and to once more show up in game 2 of the final. Not as a Legacy fan (because I'm not) but as an OCE fan who's always believed we can do it so long as the teams focus and don't get carried away by "easy" wins. The whole tournament was pretty to watch, but for them to do what they did and show that our third seed is still a good team speaks volumes for this season and the future of OPL! Looking forward to the rest of the split!
dire wolves ez world champs

When they make as many mistakes as they did, and chiefs by comparison make 1 for the tournament that was detrimental, AND Chiefs were the only team capable of grinding Mineski to  dust, even after their level 2 cheese tactics did so much work, I'd be seriously suprised if the Old Guard don't ace the rest of the OPL and show up in their place. Dire Wolves are still far too cocky and Shern reliant, and it shows not only in their gameplay, but in the way they talk.
When will the rp be sent to our accounts for getting tickets early?
Should be done now!
{{summoner:11}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Maybe now we'll get our own skin? you know just for Oceania maybe JUST MAYBE {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Well, it's not worded as a joke, at the very most it's sarcasm. Either way is it really worth logging in to troll someone? Thanks for showing the world how toxic OCE players are.
woop, so many years of oce being the shttest, this is great news. Still gonna get rekt at the worlds though haha
